front.title: IPv6 Marking and Performance and Diagnostic Metrics (MPDM)

abstract.t: To assess performance problems, this document describes optional headers embedded in each packet that provide marking, sequence numbers and timing information as a basis for measurements. Such measurements may be interpreted in real-time or after the fact. This document specifies the IPv6 Marking and Performance and Diagnostic Metrics (M-PDM) Hop-byHop and Destination Options extension headers.
